description.value:
Usage worn anklets, bracers, or circlet (often a headband)

These weighted bands don't enhance your power—rather, they keep your strength in check, honing your discipline.

Immanence The bands of imprisonment tighten, keeping your mind sharp. You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws and resistance to mental damage equal to half your level.

Transcendence—Break Free 1 (transcendence) You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] with a +2 status bonus on your check, then Stride up to twice your Speed in a straight line, and finally make a melee Strike. If you don't need to Escape or you can't move or choose not to, you still take the other actions listed.
